pkgmetadata.longdescription: # `appnope`Simple package for disabling App Nap on macOS >= 10.9,which can be problematic.To disable App Nap:```pythonimport appnopeappnope.nope()```To reenable, for some reason:```pythonappnope.nap()```or to only disable App Nap for a particular block:```with appnope.nope_scope(): do_important_stuff()```It uses ctypes to wrap a `[NSProcessInfo beginActivityWithOptions]` call to disable App Nap.To install: pip install appnope
